data.name: Succubus Dating
data.detailed_description:
This is a beautiful girl card battle turn-based game with fast memory as the core. Players need to quickly memorize many beautiful cards to find the matching one, and then attack the enemy. Of course, the enemy will not sit still. When the player remembers the wrong card or chooses the wrong card, the enemy will counterattack accordingly. A large number of level rewards will not only give players various buffs, but also unlock the corresponding beautiful girl CG pictures. Let's start with the goal of collecting all the beautiful girls~

This game is operated with the mouse. After selecting the corresponding card, it will automatically determine whether it is correct. If it is correct, it will attack the enemy. If it fails, it will be counterattacked. After the enemy's hp is reset to zero, the player wins. On the contrary, the game ends when the player's hp is reset to zero.

data.short_description: "Succubus Dating" is a real-time turn-based card strategy game. You will meet all kinds of women, and through the test of courage and wisdom, you will further draw closer to each other. Of course, they are not ordinary girls~
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may not contain content for all ages and may not be suitable for viewing at work.

Users can see in-game characters wearing revealing clothing or posing suggestive.
